quote: If the rates dropped by 200 basis points tomorrow, think about how much competition is now flooding that same market.
why_clipworthy: Highlights the potential market shift and urgency to act now.
suggested_hook: Why waiting for lower rates might backfire on homebuyers.

quote: If you can take off your selling shoes, put on your education and helping shoes, you're going to grow your business.
why_clipworthy: Encourages a shift from selling to educating, which can resonate with many agents.
suggested_hook: The secret to growing your real estate business in 2023.
